    • Method Detail

      • binarySearch

        public static byte[] binarySearch(ByteBuffer byteBuf,
                                  String word,
                                  int wordlen,
                                  int numrecs,
                                  int datalen)
                           throws IOException
        MappedFile based binary search implementation
        Parameters:
        byteBuf - in memory byte buffer
        word - search word
        wordlen - wordlength
        numrecs - number of records in table
        datalen - length of associated data
        Returns:
        byte array containing binary data associated with search word or null if term not found.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • intBinarySearch

        public static int intBinarySearch(ByteBuffer byteBuf,
                                  String word,
                                  int wordlen,
                                  int numrecs)
                           throws IOException
        MappedFile based binary search implementation
        Parameters:
        byteBuf - file pointer for binary search table
        word - search word
        wordlen - wordlength
        numrecs - number of records in table
        Returns:
        int containing address of posting, -1 if not found.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • dictionaryBinarySearch

        public static DictionaryEntry dictionaryBinarySearch(ByteBuffer byteBuf,
                                                     String word,
                                                     int wordlen,
                                                     int numrecs,
                                                     Charset charset)
                                              throws IOException
        MappedFile based binary search implementation
        Parameters:
        byteBuf - file pointer for binary search table
        word - search word
        wordlen - wordlength
        numrecs - number of records in table
        charset - charset used for encoding terms
        Returns:
        int containing address of posting, -1 if not found.
        Throws:
        IOException
